segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite busy with activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is absolutely pouring over the front edge of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a wide sheet that streams down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A growing puddle is forming on the floor, getting larger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman standing right in front of it, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the water, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains completely neutral, focused only on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how oblivious she is to the flood around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water must be doing some serious damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll slip when she eventually moves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of oversight is truly perplexing to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
